class.name: franka_example_controllers/GravityCompensationExampleController
class.description: The gravity compensation controller only sends zero torques so that the robot does gravity compensation

class.name: franka_example_controllers/JointImpedanceExampleController
class.description: The joint impedance example controller moves joint 4 and 5 in a very compliant periodic movement.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/JointVelocityExampleController
class.description: The joint velocity example controller moves joint 4 and 5 in a periodic movement.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/JointPositionExampleController
class.description: The joint position example controller moves in a periodic movement.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/CartesianVelocityExampleController
class.description: The cartesian velocity example controller commands linear velocity with x and z components.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/CartesianPoseExampleController
class.description: The cartesian pose example controller commands to translation on x and z components.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/JointImpedanceWithIKExampleController
class.description: The joint impedance using inverse kinematics from moveit-OrocosKDL(LMA-ik) and commands torques based on joint impedance control law.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/CartesianElbowExampleController
class.description: The cartesian pose example controller commands the elbow with the same initial pose configuration.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/CartesianOrientationExampleController
class.description: The cartesian orientation example controller commands to rotation around x axis.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/ElbowExampleController
class.description: The elbow example controller commands elbow position with zero cartesian velocity. Nullspace of the robot is actuated.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/MoveToStartExampleController
class.description: The move to start example controller moves the robot into default pose.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/ModelExampleController
class.description: The franka model example controller evaluates and prints the dynamic model ofFranka Robotics Robots.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/GripperExampleController
class.description: The Gripper example controller demonstrates the use of the Robot gripper.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/MoveToCase1Controller
class.description: The move to start example controller moves the robot into case1 pose.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/MoveToCase2Controller
class.description: The move to start example controller moves the robot into case2 pose.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/MoveToCase3Controller
class.description: The move to start example controller moves the robot into case3 pose.

class.name: franka_example_controllers/MoveToCase4Controller
class.description: The move to start example controller moves the robot into case4 pose.
